item.title: Software Engineer - File Systems Protocols - Sunnyvale or SF (sunnyvale)
item.description:
Software Engineer - File Systems Protocols - Sunnyvale or SF

We are a small core software development team focused on optimizing network filesystems on the Riverbed Optimization System (RiOS) platform. Our Steelhead appliances provide latency and bandwidth optimization for a wide variety of protocols. Our team works on identifying and fixing inefficiencies in UNIX and Windows file sharing protocols.

What you will work on:

  • Solve complex and challenging distributed file systems locking problems
  • Developing optimization services for new file-sharing protocols
  • Developing new features that enhance the existing product, many of them are high visibility features for important customers.
  • Constantly look for possibilities to improve the existing product when examining network traces and client behavior
  • Troubleshooting complex customer issues that requires a deep understanding of systems software

At Riverbed,  we look for smart, energetic and talented Software Engineers  who is passionate about programming  in C or C++ in Linux environments.  We look for Engineers who gets things done!

You should have the following: 

  • BS/MS in CS.
  • Very strong C++/C programming skills
  • Detail oriented, with a strong desire to build high quality software
  • Deep understanding of systems and/or networking
  • Strong desire to learn new skills and technology
  • Some development experience in the systems space is a plus

No sponsorship or transfer of visas available at this time.

If you are interested, please send an email with attached resume to the address above or to our website at www.riverbed.com/company/careers. Riverbed Technology, Inc. is a San Francisco and Sunnyvale company near CalTrain, Muni and BART, with excellent salary, options and benefits. We are proud to be an EEO/AA employer M/F/D/V.
